@graph.caption: Banana Chocolate Cake /Bread. Vegan Oil-free recipe

@graph.name: Banana Chocolate Cake /Bread. Vegan Oil-free recipe - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: This Banana chocolate cake is moist and chocolatey with 3 bananas. Can be made oil-free. Vegan Recipe

itemListElement.name: Banana Chocolate Cake /Bread. Vegan Oil-free recipe

@graph.name: Banana Chocolate Cake/Bread. Vegan Oil-free recipe
@graph.description: Banana Chocolate Cake / Bread recipe.  Vegan and oil free
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup Spelt flour (or use gluten-free flour blend or 1/4 cup each Oat, millet, tapioca/corn starch)
To make it more moistadd 1/4 cup coconut oil or oil of choice(I usually skip the oil)
Add 1/3 cup chocolate chips to the batter for a double chocolate cake

recipeInstructions.text: Add vinegar and sugar and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add vinegar and sugar and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the coconut milk, add chocolate and melt.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat the coconut milk, add chocolate and melt.

recipeInstructions.text: Add melted chocolate, spices(or coffee) to banana and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add melted chocolate, spices(or coffee) to banana and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: If using oil, add now and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: If using oil, add now and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix 1/2 cup oat flour, 1/2 cup ground cashew, 1/2 cup spelt flour and baking powder.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix 1/2 cup oat flour, 1/2 cup ground cashew, 1/2 cup spelt flour and baking powder.

recipeInstructions.text: Add this to the banana mixture and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add this to the banana mixture and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add more spelt flour if needed to get a muffin batter type thick batter. The flour needed will depend on what size bananas you used, the chocolate and oil content.
recipeInstructions.name: Add more spelt flour if needed to get a muffin batter type thick batter. The flour needed will depend on what size bananas you used, the chocolate and oil content.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chocolate chips for double chocolate version.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chocolate chips for double chocolate version.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the batter in parchment lined or greased 8 inch cake pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop the batter in parchment lined or greased 8 inch cake pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Even out and bake in pre-heated 365 degrees F  / 180ºc for 40-45 minutes or until a toothpick from the center comes out clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Even out and bake in pre-heated 365 degrees F  / 180ºc for 40-45 minutes or until a toothpick from the center comes out clean.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool for 5 minutes and remove from parchment.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool for 5 minutes and remove from parchment.
